body: Visit Our Island Classroom These resources help make the Channel Islands come alive for students while meeting your classroom needs. Parks as Classrooms: Field trips, ranger programs in your classroom, and lesson plans and other curriculum materials Professional Development: Workshops for teachers Distance Learning: Interactive programs available through use of videoconferencing equipment or free software                 Channel Islands Live Can’t bring your students to the Channel Islands? Connect your class from afar with a ranger in the park to explore a variety of topics. Read More        Webcams Take a virtual visit to the Channel Islands through the park's Bald Eagle, Anacapa Island, or Ocean Webcams. Read More        Island of the Blue Dolphins Discover more about the historical events and real places that inspired Scott O’Dell to write this book. Read More
title: Channel Islands National Park: Education
